edu.washington.ext

Class Librarian

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.washington.ext.common.AbstractEmployee
      • edu.washington.ext.Librarian
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommissionedEmployee, Employee

    final class Librarian
extends AbstractEmployee
implements Employee, CommissionedEmployee
    A Librarian employee. Librarian receive their base pay plus a bonus equal to a percentage of the Library's used book total sales. All librarians receive the same percentage of their Library's used book total sales. librarian's don't receive separate commission/bonus for their individual used book sales.
    Author:
    Chris Turner
